text: Ivan J Myall (born 1947), is a male former swimmer who competed for England. ==Swimming career== He represented England and won two bronze medals in the 4 x 100 and 4 x 200 metres freestyle relays, at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:English male swimmers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in swimming Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Swimmers at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Ivan Myall
